bioconda.name: bioconductor-motifstack
bioconda.summary: Plot stacked logos for single or multiple DNA, RNA and amino acid sequence

biotools.summary: This package is designed for graphic representation of multiple motifs with different similarity scores. It works with both DNA/RNA sequence motif and amino acid sequence motif. In addition, it provides the flexibility for users to customize the graphic parameters such as the font type and symbol colors.

bioschemas.name: motifStack
bioschemas.summary: This package is designed for graphic representation of multiple motifs with different similarity scores. It works with both DNA/RNA sequence motif and amino acid sequence motif. In addition, it provides the flexibility for users to customize the graphic parameters such as the font type and symbol colors.
